cliVerb.name: registry-test
cliVerb.summary: Verify that a .NET type is compatible with a schema in the Schema Registry.

examples.body:
$ dotnet avro registry-test --assembly ./out/Example.Models.dll --registry-url http://registry:8081 --subject example_subject --type Example.Models.ExampleModel
A deserializer cannot be created for ExampleModel: ExampleModel does not have a field or property that matches the Number field on ExampleModel.
examples.title: Test that a type works with the latest version of a subject

options.name: assembly
options.summary: The name of or path to an assembly to load (multiple space-separated values accepted).

options.name: enums-as-ints
options.summary: Whether enums should be represented as integers.

options.name: nullable-references
options.summary: Whether reference types should be nullable.

options.name: temporal-behavior
options.summary: Whether timestamps should be represented with "string" schemas (ISO 8601) or "long" schemas (timestamp logical types). Options are iso8601, epochmilliseconds, and epochmicroseconds.

options.name: type
options.summary: The type to build a schema for.

options.name: registry-url
options.summary: The URL of the schema registry.
